typedef APS_UpdateStatus_t APS_UdrStatus_t

Definition at line 54 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum APS_UpdateStatus_t

The APS-layer provides services that allow a device (for example, a router) to inform another device (for example, a Trust Center) that a third device has changed its status (for example, joined or left the network). See ZigBee Specification r19, 4.4.4, page 459. Status of creating and sending a update device command frame.

Definition at line 40 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

enum APS_UpdateDeviceStatus_t

Type is used to indicate the updated status of the device given by the DeviceAddress parameter. See ZigBee Spec. r19, Table 4.20.

Definition at line 68 of file apsmeUpdateDevice.h.

Function Documentation

void APS_UpdateDeviceReq ( APS_UpdateDeviceReq_t *  req)

Request to inform a device that another device has new status.

The ZDO (for example, on a router or ZigBee coordinator) shall initiate the APSME-UPDATE-DEVICE.request primitive when it wants to send updated device information to another device (for example, the Trust Center). See ZigBee Specification r15, 4.4.1, page 459.

Parameters:
[in]req- pointer to APSME-UPDATE-DEVICE.request's parameters.
Returns:
None.
Response statuses:
Accessed via the APS_UpdateDeviceConf_t::status field of the APS_UpdateDeviceReq_t::APS_UpdateDeviceConf callback's argument.
void APS_UpdateDeviceInd ( APS_UpdateDeviceInd_t *  ind,
const ShortAddr_t *  parentShortAddr 
)

Inform the upper-layer that it received an update-device command frame.

Parameters:
